item.description:
Sorry for the last minute change, but no farm this time. :(
We will be going to a yummy delicious Indian food place right near Chili's on Rt.9. It's right on the Worcester/Shrewsbury line and is very inexpensive.


CARPOOLING IS AVAILABLE!!!!!!!!!
For help with directions or if you have questions, call Stephen (me) at (508) 410-3172. Thanks!
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp December Meetup
